title: Sustainable Resource Management Decision-Making Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical modeling and data analysis competencies
context.additional_context: A course for graduate math majors and job-seeking professionals in related fields, cultivating decision-making competencies by applying mathematical approaches to sustainability issues.

learning_goals: Learners can propose decision-making solutions using optimization modeling techniques in sustainable resource management scenarios.
Learners can conduct resource allocation simulations using statistical analysis tools and interpret the results.
Learners can derive balanced resource management solutions amid conflicting interests using multi-criteria decision-making frameworks (AHP, TOPSIS, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
